statements: DELETE FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 100 AND clicks > 50;
DELETE FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions < 1000 AND conversion_rate >= 0.05;
DELETE FROM ad_adjustments WHERE adjustment_id = 500 AND adjustment_type = 'Budget Increase';
DELETE FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 100 AND clicks > 50;
DELETE FROM ad_adjustments WHERE adjustment_type = 'Increase' AND adjustment_amount > 1000;

DELETE FROM ad_clicks WHERE clicked_url = 'https://example.com' AND device_type = 'Mobile';
DELETE FROM ads WHERE id = 101 AND clicks < 1000;
